title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Basic Fundamental Law Enforcement Practices

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Basic Fundamental Law Enforcement Practices; This is a five week course conducted at the DEA Academy in Quantico, VA and is a requirement for all officers to complete who are assigned to DEA Sensitive Investigative Units (SIU) worldwide. The basic course serves as their foundation in fundamental law enforcement practices for these newly assigned officers. It is based on the DEA Basic Agent training program and covers a wide range of topics in drug law enforcement.
